website_summaries.verdict: This large set of long-handled spoons are stronger than they look and come in at a shockingly low cost.
pros: The long, thin middle is aesthetically pleasing and stronger than it appears
The lightweight spoons are ideal for stirring drinks while keeping your glassware safe
8-inch spoons have a high quality shine to them
cons: The thinness of the spoons makes them uncomfortable to hold for extended periods of time

customer_reviews.title: Its the little things
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my husband needed to stir his daily cups of coffee. He uses tall coffee mugs and would use a knife to stir his drinks. These nice long handled spoons made him smile when I left it by his coffee mug the first morning. Being newlyweds, I also gained a few brownie points for thinking to get these for him. It’s the little things that really count.
customer_reviews.author: Mshuff

customer_reviews.title: Super Thin Handle
customer_reviews.text: Not strong enough for ice cream as stated in the description. Picture looks thicker than the ones I received. These may be ok for stirring iced tea but not good for ice cream unless possibly half-melted soft serve. The handle near the rounded part is so thin, it feels like it will break if you put pressure on it. I do not recommend these spoons for anything more than stirring. This spoon is the middle one pictured, decide for yourself. Would give it 3 stars if I purchased this for stirring, 2 stars off because of the thinness of the handle as seen in my photos but not shown accurately in the sellers.
customer_reviews.author: Hemingwaysgal

customer_reviews.title: Spoons from my childhood
customer_reviews.text: Ever have a utensil that brought you wayyyy back to your childhood?? Well, this one does it for me. My mom had a set of these when I was a kid, and I used them for everything. So- now I'm living with the parents (their full time caretaker) and alas there are only two left of my favorite spoons...so, I bought myself a set for their house!! Lol That's my review of something as simple as a spoon...
customer_reviews.author: Lisa GloverTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: For the guy who drinks a giant mug of tea.
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes to drink chai, not from tea cups, but using giant half liter mugs. Chai usually involves spooning in a teaspoon or 2 of sugar, and mixing it. A normal teaspoon is too short to mix his mug with. These are teaspoons for the tea drinker who drinks a mugga, instead of a cuppa tea!
customer_reviews.author: Afeefa

customer_reviews.title: very delicate handle
customer_reviews.text: I like the length. I like the size. I use them to stir honey into my hot cacao drinks because I use a tall mug.
customer_reviews.author: Cardinal

customer_reviews.title: that they are made of good quality materials and appeal to the eye.
customer_reviews.text: They will come in handy to go with a future purchase of a malt/shake blender...this id the second time I have ordered them...I also used them with other drinks....
customer_reviews.author: Pearl M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice spoons that blend in with most flatware sets
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses these spoons for a lot of things. They work perfectly to stir big cups of drinks or milkshakes. These spoons were a nice set that you can fit in with your regular silverware. The price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Rusted
customer_reviews.text: After a few months they all started to rust along the sides. Bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, light weight material.
customer_reviews.text: These are super light weight and a couple arrived malformed. Not a big deal to me, as I intent to give them light use, but these are definitely not as durable or heavy as I hoped. Used for anything more than stirring tea/coffee, I wouldn't expect these to hold up for long. Personally, I wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt C Erickson

customer_reviews.title: long handle makes it easy to stir 2qt containers
customer_reviews.text: i use it to stir drinks in thermos and containers that are deep
customer_reviews.author: mary ann sheen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Iced Coffee Spoon
customer_reviews.text: I have been drinking iced coffee for awhile now and regular teaspoons are too short. I like these long handle spoons, they are sturdy and balanced. For my use, I don't mind that they are plain and not decorative.
customer_reviews.author: Mammo Queen

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible.....I put them in the dishwasher when I received them and they had rust on them after the cycle. I threw them out.
customer_reviews.author: MAK

customer_reviews.title: Not Stainless Steel
customer_reviews.text: Received spoons. Looked great, but failed Stainless Steel test. Stainless Steel is NON- Magnetic, so a magnet will not stick to anything made of Stainless Steel. These spoons stuck to magnet aggressively. Must be loaded with carbon steel, and plated. I will be asking for refund.
customer_reviews.author: M. Romero

customer_reviews.title: Realistic Review
customer_reviews.text: Pro: -True tsp. -Stainless steel -Easy to clean -makes spoonful size a reasonable size (not a huge spoon to shovel food in your mouth at amazing speed, eating speed is not a contest people) Cons: -None noted Some other reviews reported the edges were "sharp" of their mouths. I have not encountered this at all. Some reported they are flimsy, unless you are trying to pry hard frozen ice cream out of a gallon (which you have chosen the wrong tool) or you are hulking it out with this spoon, it will be sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: MsStandards

customer_reviews.title: Great spoons for ice cream!
customer_reviews.text: These spoons have a great classic look to them. Very shiny and dainty. Perfect for stirring cocktails or milkshakes and even for eating sundaes, etc. they are very thin and not the most sturdy spoon... but they are a stirring spoon! Use them for that! Compared to normal spoon in my photo. There are only 7 long ones because I lost one... oops.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lee

customer_reviews.title: just as described
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are lovely. They are just as described -- they are not cheap looking or cheap feeling. A regular teaspoon is too large for my 96-year-old mother, and these spoons, with a slim bowl, are perfect. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Lavonne Ochs

customer_reviews.title: Thinest long handle spoon I've EVER seen !!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in these spoons !!!!! Where the handle connects to the actual spoon is SO THIN !!! Not sure they will hold up for very long :-/
customer_reviews.author: B W

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR ICRE CREAM FLOATS!
customer_reviews.text: My family had similar spoons when I was growing up. They are perfect for ice cream floats! We like to enjoy a root beer float on hot summer evenings so I started hunting for the long spoons that are a perfect match. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Judy G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice long handle spoons!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sister as a gift. She loves them for her iced teas. She said they were high quality spoons. I am glad I made a nice purchase. I might order a set for myself soon.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Spoons stained after first use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these primarily for stirring iced tea and now they are staining. The spoons are only exposed to the drink for less than a minute and are cleaned in a dishwasher. The spoons are turning a darker gray. Makes me wonder what's in the plating for these. If I had a test kit, I would check for lead or other metals.
customer_reviews.author: Cammi

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose I want it to do.
customer_reviews.text: I use it as an ice cream server spoon in a tall glass for smoothies and floats. Great product and not a plastic, and that it can be used forever.
customer_reviews.author: norma

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I make sweet tea in 30oz Yeti glasses and need longer spoons to reach the bottom. These are doing great.
customer_reviews.author: Capt Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not good. Too thin and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: These were very disappointing. The material is very light. Feels like it is going to break. They are so thin that it makes it difficult to hold. It doesn't have rounded edges but more like a sharp 90 degree finish that makes it painful to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Winchy

customer_reviews.title: Great for root beer floats
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Christmas. Had root beer floats! Was a hit! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Diana baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Update:  3/4/19
customer_reviews.text: Nice medium weight spoon, perfect size and length simple design. Seems sturdy, though I have not tested it on frozen ice cream. I only wish it were a little heavier to match the weight of my other utensils. This is just a personal preference though. 3/4/19 Ordered my second batch of spoons because the first quickly became everyone's favorite and I seem to keep losing them. They do work on ice cream that is not rock solid frozen.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Ice Tea Spoon
customer_reviews.text: This spoon is very lightweight. Mu uses are stirring in a bit of sugar to my iced coffee or adding honey to my oatmeal. I wouldn't recommend it for diving into a banana split or a root beer float. I think the handle may start to bend and reduce the life of the spoon.
customer_reviews.author: FayE

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't find these in the stores. Glad I didn't. Nice utensil for a good price. Arrived a day earlier than scheduled individually bagged. I'm a tea drinker and regular spoons are never long enough to mix the tea / honey - these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SC-techie

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and slimline
customer_reviews.text: I would start with the fact that the spoon portion is a bit smaller than I expected. The other facts are that these spoons are nice and sleek and slim and perfect for mixing tea in a travel mug which is why I ordered them. Love them more than I thought I would.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Richards

customer_reviews.title: Love These Spoons
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect. The lower ratings don't make any sense to me. These are not flimsy at all. I wonder what those reviewers were trying to lift with them, concrete? These are stainless steel, beautifully shiny, strong, and just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Craft

customer_reviews.title: Handy, multipurpose spoons.
customer_reviews.text: these long handled spoons are not as study as some I had from our local kitchen store, which closed unfortunately. The spoon part is rounder so it doesn’t fit as well through narrow bottlenecks but still a handy thing to have around. Great for scooping peanut butter, mayonnaise, jelly or anything else that comes in a tall jar. Also good for stirring tea.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny ND

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: I drink tea with honey and the tall travel mug I use everyday needs a plastic straw to reach the bottom to stir and it doesn't do a good job and is bad for the environment. So now instead of using a disposable straw these spoons do the trick! I love them - they do a better job and nothing to throw away!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Nice & lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t go scooping ice cream with these light weight teaspoons but good for stirring my 20oz cup of coffee in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca Klein

customer_reviews.title: A bit thinner/lighter than expected
customer_reviews.text: The spoons have a good length and shape, and look good when serving tea . If you use them for ice cream though, the metal is pretty thin and the handle edges are squared. This makes them a bit pokey to eat from when you hold them. Still for the price they are fair enough.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for sometimes-usage
customer_reviews.text: We bough these for root beer floats. We used them tonight and they work well enough I guess. The spoon part is pretty shallow and the handle is very slender. But they work well enough and I didn't feel like they were going to break.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: There ok
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were the same size as a teaspoon just with a long handle but they're actually half that. Much smaller. They're good for stirring coffee in a large tall cup but a little small for a frosty/milkshake.
customer_reviews.author: sunnyst8

customer_reviews.title: They appear to be good quality especially considering the price
customer_reviews.text: I use these primarily for scooping my green tea matcha out of the bag and mixing in tall mugs. They appear to be good quality especially considering the price. I've been using them daily for a couple months, no rust, no rough edges. I would get them again.
customer_reviews.author: Northwest girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice spoon to stir drinks in tall glasses
customer_reviews.text: The spoons have no pattern on the handle. It is polished to a nice reflective sheen. The spoon handles are sturdy enough for stirring drinks, but probably not good for mixing something like dough.
customer_reviews.author: David Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Long, tall, and perfect for...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a spoon that would reach the bottom of my smoothie glass, and my super ice cream sundae glass... Finally I have a whole set of them so there’s always one available
customer_reviews.author: Mmikes

customer_reviews.title: Teaspoons
customer_reviews.text: A little disappointed in these spoons, they do not have the weight of the regular teaspoons. I still have an Older one that I still have. These are good but they feel cheap. They aren’t cheap but they FEEL like it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Bosserman

customer_reviews.title: Great for dishes where ur spoon will fall in.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Ordered a package a couple years ago, like them so much I ordered another one. Great for eating out of tupperware containers where a reg spoon would fall in the food. I have a small mouth and also dislike any food getting on the handle of the spoon. These work very well!
customer_reviews.author: Faith and David

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great for my Irish hot chocolate in my tall Irish mugs :-D. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so good
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are way too thin. It's suitable for people with smaller hands. I found them so hard to handle. I threw one of them upon receiving, because it's defective.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah X

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, elegant and we loved them. We use them for every dessert we eat. We have tried other similar spoons and we were not happy with the durability. These do not bend. We are beyond happy with our purchase
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A Zschokke

customer_reviews.title: Good for tall cups
customer_reviews.text: These spoons could be just a tad longer in length. They do work for tall cups, but you have to hold the very end of the spoon. If they were a little longer would be easier to hold and stir. Otherwise works well.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Magic

customer_reviews.title: My coffee spoons
customer_reviews.text: I had lost my one and only tea spoon and just couldn't enjoy my coffee without it. Hahaha, so got a set so if I loose one it won't be that bad. I don't know what it is about having to have one of these kinds of spoons for my coffee but yeah. Anyway, these are great!
customer_reviews.author: S. Bryant'Peters

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Have not used them, but they look good and somewhat sturdy. Then stem at the spoon is a little thin, but for my purposes I suspect they will work as intended (scooping honey). For $9 you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Browning

customer_reviews.title: Cute long spoons.
customer_reviews.text: I like these long spoons for coffee and yogurts. They’re just pleasant to hold. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria D

customer_reviews.title: Good additional spoons for cooking
customer_reviews.text: I like to use these when cooking. Length is helpful when checking a hot pot, getting ingredients out of tall containers. I would like a bit more weight to it, but they seem to hold up well so far, and wash up well in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: berma

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've ordered ice tea spoons thru Amazon, as they're becoming increasingly hard to find. So ordering is a gamble. Both times. These are attractive, nice to handle, and of a good quality. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JLMG

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Ice Cream Spoons
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Nothing special or fancy, just sturdy and don't bend when eating ice cream: unless you have rock hard. Any spoon would bend if you put enough pressure on it. I recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Springfield MO

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed some iced tea spoons, not necessarily for iced tea, but if you make a cup of coffee in a to go cup, they are usually taller and I love spoons that reach all the way to the bottom. These do just that.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Buy them, they last forever!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, highly polished and quite functional. These are ideal dessert spoons, and also perfect for tall iced tea glasses. These are much sturdier than dessert spoons I bought at Wal-Mart, and these are a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Dudeboy 1959

customer_reviews.title: A lot lighter than I had hoped for. I like heavier feeling utensils.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to solve s problem, I have to feed my brother, who has a swallowing issue a thick protein shake as part of his meal. I could never seem to get to the bottom of the 24 oz cup without wearing it all over my fingers. I remember using spoons like this at the soda fountain when eating a hot fudge Sundae. These did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Giles

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful spoons for stirring tea or anything. They are super strong and that surprises me because they look fragile. These are my favorite spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Britney A Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter prefers these over the regular handed spoons. They are a great addition to our regular set. Sometimes you just need a larger handle
customer_reviews.author: Abrecia Nasset

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased
customer_reviews.text: What I love about this produce is how many you get. I’m in a hurry in the morning, I like to stir my coffee with a little skinny spoon, throw it in the dishwasher, and not waste a whole actual spoon.
customer_reviews.author: LovePrime

customer_reviews.title: Long is relative
customer_reviews.text: It is long as a table spoon with small cup
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: SLIM AND TRIM
customer_reviews.text: These spoons look nice. I think they're a bit too slim and the spoon end is a bit small for eating ice cream or any other desert. But they'll be perfect for stirring drinks, tea or coffee in tall glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Designer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift....(I start early!)....if my daughter-in-law doesn't like them....I will just keep them myself. Very balanced, long handle and will "fit" any stainless set.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Lois Payne

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel. They are sturdy spoons. I only wish the handle was a little bit wider for my large hands.
customer_reviews.author: J Welker

customer_reviews.title: Spoon is small
customer_reviews.text: The handles are okay, but the spoons are a bit small. I was not expecting the size of the spoon to be so small.
customer_reviews.author: magic

customer_reviews.title: Made for children's hands
customer_reviews.text: Yhwy look juat like the pictures, but are so thin and lightweight that it feels as if they were plasti or made for children's hands
customer_reviews.author: Ivette

customer_reviews.title: Great value, convenient purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are great. In laws have taken over them for coffee and tea. Excellent to have anywhere drinks are mixed or brewed.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Great Spoons!
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are great! However, I just wish they were a tad bit larger, as the spoon portion is small, but they are long enough!
customer_reviews.author: Tessra P.

customer_reviews.title: Great value - great product
customer_reviews.text: Needed some longer spoons for coffee in the yeti. These are great quality and exactly as described! Very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Tom S

customer_reviews.title: Strong but very thin
customer_reviews.text: Strong and pretty but so thin they are awkward to hold. They do reach the bottom of a tall olive jar and a mayo jar.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy A. Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: A little flimsy for me.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for these. They will only be used for gentle stirring. They are very light and seem delicate. They also retain a coffee or tea ring if you don't set them in water right away.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Richards

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my milkshake glasses
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my milkshake glasses Comfortable to use and good quality for the price. Have been using them for a couple months and they are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: They do the trick!!!
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are great for my overnight oatmeal made in mason jars. But would be great for any narrow or deep cup, glass, jar or serving dish. The spoon could be a bit sturdier and the spoon part could be a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lady

customer_reviews.title: Extremely thin metal, very flimsy, bends easily.  Don’t buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Very very flimsy. Typical of the country of origin. Would have preferred to buy USA made.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pohlman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ice cream spoons
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are perfect for ice cream and yogurt. You can't go wrong with these spoons. There perfect...
customer_reviews.author: King and Queen

customer_reviews.title: tall glass stirrers.... works great.
customer_reviews.text: They do the job I bought them for. Stirring meds into tall glasses of tea. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: McDee

customer_reviews.title: Right length for the job
customer_reviews.text: So glad we found these. We use sweetner in our iced tea but could never find these in any stores locally. Just the right amount of spoons for us. Love that they get all the way to the bottom of a tall glass.
customer_reviews.author: Betty O.

customer_reviews.title: Nicest iced tea spoons I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my girlfriend, who somehow had only one iced tea spoon and complained about it. She is absolutely delighted with these. I can see why, too. They may be the nicest I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. DeBusk

customer_reviews.title: Long and Lean
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted-something to stir my coffee in a big mug without getting my fingers wet! AND now I can stir my summertime sweet tea without using a serving spoon!
customer_reviews.author: Edna Scott

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Spoons...
customer_reviews.text: Use these regularly and needed a few more...these lived up to (and maybe surpassed) the ones I had. Very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: All and more than “as advertised”
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, fair price, individual sleeved wrapped with plastic package as well. Simple plain will blend with most any pattern
customer_reviews.author: R. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to find iced tea spoons for years but could never find any in the stores. These are exactly what I’ve been looking for. Not only do the work well with tall iced tea glasses but they also come in handy when I’m making coffee in my tall travel mugs
customer_reviews.author: H. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be of great quality. I use them regularly and am very satisfied with them. Nice and shines and fits hand well.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Strong, sturdy, convenient for tall mugs / glasses.
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are strong, perfect size for tall coffee cups/mugs; and they are of excellent quality. They wash well in the dishwasher and come out shiny and do not tarnish or rust. Very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good teaspoons for reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for teaspoons similar to ones I inherited from my wonderful mother in law. While these match, they are not as sturdy. Still a good product for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Marti Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: I love these tea spoons. Great length and convenient for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: handle is long as stated but very small spoon
customer_reviews.text: I knew these would be smaller because their soda spoons but not that small! Their more like a baby spoon on a long handle. Even for an ice cream soda they would be way too small to hold even the pop to get get it to your mouth without making a mess. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice spoons
customer_reviews.text: Works great for anything you need a long handle spoon for, specially ice cream floats
customer_reviews.author: CO

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use when I make malted milks and they work great. They are a pleasant reminder of the 50's for me.
customer_reviews.author: Reconron1951

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect length for mixing in taller glasses. The rounded bowl makes them great for ice cream sundaes and they move beverages around the glass more effectively than the smaller-bowl spoons I already owned. Quite happy.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne L.

customer_reviews.title: Great spoon for Iced coffee
customer_reviews.text: Great spoon for Iced coffee, hot cocoa, Iced tea and even ice cream! I also use it to remove left over products from the bottom of bottles or jars, like mayo, shampoo, etc. If the container is too narrow I use the bottom of the spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Richards

customer_reviews.title: Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Loved these spoons. They are so nice for stirring drinks in tall glasses. I use them all of the time. Good quality. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Owen

customer_reviews.title: Something So Simple, Yet Useful
customer_reviews.text: I so missed having iced tea spoons and sets don't come with them anymore, at least that I've seen. Perfect for mixing chocolate syrup and milk, useful for shakes and of course iced tea.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon West

customer_reviews.title: Nice, long and sturdy spoons.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. Nice and long spoons for our parfait ice cream glasses. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not as heavy as I️ thought. Okay for Icd tea, but I️ think the neck will bend with ice cream. And the silver looked to be coming off on some, even though they were individually wrapped.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Cantwell

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and functional
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with the quality, no sharp edges, been through the dishwasher a couple of times and no issues. Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: The spoons are very thin but the esthetic is nice and the price is on point for what you're getting. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Mohr

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality good price.
customer_reviews.text: Spoons are very nicely weighted and the color is perfect. Long handle so they can really get to the bottom of the glass/jar. I like that they aren’t a huge spoon as well.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: FLIMSY DESIGN.
customer_reviews.text: Shape was Ok. Metal was way to lite not sturdy. Product looked flimsy. They will do for what I wanted but I would not reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Dayton Shermer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE SPOONS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I love these “iced tea” spoons as my Mom called them. I love a tall glass of chocolate milk and a long spoon for stirring!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen A.

customer_reviews.title: Long Spoon
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for this type of spoon and this fits the bill. Perfect for my root beer floats!
customer_reviews.author: echo heart

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bhonest

customer_reviews.title: Long Handled Ice Cream Spoons
customer_reviews.text: Another of the best made ice cream long handled spoons. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THESE TO ANYONE LOOKING FOR THE BEST PRODUCT HERE ON AMAZON.COMS BEST SELLERS LIST

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
